title: Labs
text: Each lab includes an R script and a brief writeup. Submit both via Canvas.

title: Welcome to Econ 106
text:
This website hosts course content for Econ 106: Data Analysis in Economics.
Use the navigation bar to explore lecture notes, labs, and other course resources.

title: About
text:
Course taught by Dr. Veronica Sovero
Poll Everywhere: pollev.com/vsovero

title: Syllabus
text: An introduction to data analysis using R for students in economics. Covers data wrangling, visualization, and interpretation.

title: Syllabus
text:
Grading

Labs: 40%
Project Milestones: 30%
Final Project: 20%
Participation (Poll Everywhere): 10%
